00018 #ifndef COBASE_MONITOR_H
00019 #define COBASE_MONITOR_H
00020 
00021 #include <co/base/nonCopyable.h> // base class
00022 #include <co/base/condition.h>   // member
00023 
00024 #include <errno.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <typeinfo>
00028 
00029 namespace co
00030 {
00031 namespace base
00032 {
00040     template< typename T > class Monitor : public NonCopyable
00041     {
00042     public:
00044         Monitor() : _value( T( 0 )) {}
00045 
00047         Monitor( const T& value ) : _value( value ) {}
00048         
00050         ~Monitor() {}
00051 
00055         Monitor& operator++ ()
00056             {
00057                 _cond.lock();
00058                 ++_value;
00059                 _cond.broadcast();
00060                 _cond.unlock();
00061                 return *this;
00062             }
00063 
00065         Monitor& operator-- ()
00066             {
00067                 _cond.lock();
00068                 --_value;
00069                 _cond.broadcast();
00070                 _cond.unlock();
00071                 return *this;
00072             }
00073 
00075         Monitor& operator = ( const T& value )
00076             {
00077                 set( value );
00078                 return *this;
00079             }
00080 
00082         Monitor& operator |= ( const T& value )
00083             {
00084                 _cond.lock();
00085                 _value |= value;
00086                 _cond.broadcast();
00087                 _cond.unlock();
00088                 return *this;
00089             }
00090 
00092         void set( const T& value )
00093             {
00094                 _cond.lock();
00095                 _value = value;
00096                 _cond.broadcast();
00097                 _cond.unlock();
00098             }
00100 
00108         const T& waitEQ( const T& value ) const
00109             {
00110                 _cond.lock();
00111                 while( _value != value )
00112                     _cond.wait();
00113                 _cond.unlock();
00114                 return value;
00115             }
00116 
00122         const T& waitNE( const T& value ) const
00123             {
00124                 _cond.lock();
00125                 while( _value == value )
00126                     _cond.wait();
00127                 const T& newValue = _value;
00128                 _cond.unlock();
00129                 return newValue;
00130             }
00131 
00137         const T& waitNE( const T& v1, const T& v2 ) const
00138             {
00139                 _cond.lock();
00140                 while( _value == v1 || _value == v2 )
00141                     _cond.wait();
00142                 const T& newValue = _value;
00143                 _cond.unlock();
00144                 return newValue;
00145             }
00146 
00153         const T& waitGE( const T& value ) const
00154             {
00155                 _cond.lock();
00156                 while( _value < value )
00157                     _cond.wait();
00158                 const T& newValue = _value;
00159                 _cond.unlock();
00160                 return newValue;
00161             }
00162 
00169         const T& waitLE( const T& value ) const
00170             {
00171                 _cond.lock();
00172                 while( _value > value )
00173                     _cond.wait();
00174                 const T& newValue = _value;
00175                 _cond.unlock();
00176                 return newValue;
00177             }
00178 
00180 
00183         bool operator == ( const T& value ) const { return _value == value; }
00184         bool operator != ( const T& value ) const { return _value != value; }
00185         bool operator < ( const T& value ) const { return _value < value; }
00186         bool operator > ( const T& value ) const { return _value > value; }
00187         bool operator <= ( const T& value ) const { return _value <= value; }
00188         bool operator >= ( const T& value ) const { return _value >= value; }
00189 
00190         bool operator == ( const Monitor<T>& rhs ) const
00191             { return _value == rhs._value; }
00192         bool operator != ( const Monitor<T>& rhs ) const
00193             { return _value != rhs._value; }
00194         bool operator < ( const Monitor<T>& rhs ) const
00195             { return _value < rhs._value; }
00196         bool operator > ( const Monitor<T>& rhs ) const
00197             { return _value > rhs._value; }
00198         bool operator <= ( const Monitor<T>& rhs ) const
00199             { return _value <= rhs._value; }
00200         bool operator >= ( const Monitor<T>& rhs ) const
00201             { return _value >= rhs._value; }
00203 
00207         const T& operator->() const { return _value; }
00208 
00210         const T& get() const { return _value; }
00211 
00213         T operator + ( const T& value ) const { return _value + value; }
00214 
00216         T operator | ( const T& value ) const
00217             { return static_cast< T >( _value | value ); }
00218 
00220         T operator & ( const T& value ) const
00221             { return static_cast< T >( _value & value ); }
00223 
00224     private:
00225         T _value;
00226         mutable Condition _cond;
00227     };
00228 
00229     typedef Monitor< bool >     Monitorb;
00230     typedef Monitor< uint32_t > Monitoru;
00231 
00233     template< typename T >
00234     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00235                                        const Monitor<T>& monitor )
00236     {
00237         os << "Monitor< " << monitor.get() << " >";
00238         return os;
00239     }
00240 
00241     template<> inline Monitor< bool >& Monitor< bool >::operator++ ()
00242     {
00243         _cond.lock();
00244         assert( !_value );
00245         _value = !_value;
00246         _cond.broadcast();
00247         _cond.unlock();
00248         return *this;
00249     }
00250 
00251     template<> inline Monitor< bool >& Monitor< bool >::operator-- ()
00252     {
00253         _cond.lock();
00254         assert( !_value );
00255         _value = !_value;
00256         _cond.broadcast();
00257         _cond.unlock();
00258         return *this;
00259     }
00260 
00261     template<> 
00262     inline Monitor< bool >& Monitor< bool >::operator |= ( const bool& value )
00263     {
00264         if( value )
00265             _value = value;
00266         return *this;
00267     }
00268 }
00269 }
00270 #endif //COBASE_MONITOR_H
